title: Senior Manager, Business Development - Walmart Fulfillment Services Seller Growth

no_experience_required: False,

description:
Position Summary...

What you'll do...

T his role is critical to binding our product strategy to the tactics we need to drive success in product launches, adoption , and overall Walmart Fulfillment Services seller growth and retention .

You will be the product evangelist and will play an integral role in organizing product launches and engagement campaigns directly to sellers as well as e nabling C hannel P artners to drive adoption of WFS services among their seller audience.

The right candidate will have outstanding time management and communications skills, with a strong background in strategy, great attention to detail, demonstrated ability to successfully partner with internal cross-functional teams and external partners to drive outcomes.

What you'll do...
• Design and execute personalized lifecycle marketing strategy to engage , grow, and retain sellers on WFS.
• O wn go-to-market seller communication strategy from end-to-end including core value proposition, creative & copy development, deployment, reporting, and optimization across integrated marketing plans including social posts, newsletters, emails, webinars, paid media.
• Develop and manage an annual/quarterly editorial calendar for the key products you support to drive product adoption and engagement among sellers on Walmart Marketplace and Channel Partner platforms.
• Partner with the GTM, Product, Marketing, Channel Partnership, Content/UX teams and other stakeholders to ensure a smooth go-to-market process for all new product releases and updates as well as evergreen campaigns for key products.
• Check in with all stakeholders regularly to communicate all SLAs, project status, and/or launch date changes.
• Assess the effectiveness of the marketing programs that support your products on an ongoing basis, uncover opportunities for optimization, and communicate performance metrics and results to leadership and stakeholders.
• R epresent WFS at industry conferences (15-20% travel required ).

You'll sweep us off our feet if...
• 5+ years of project management/product marketing experience with digital marketing/creative department or agency.
• You have experience in automating B2B lifecycle marketing campaigns.
• Strong understanding of creative development capabilities and SLAs.
• You have high standards for writing, grammar, and attention to detail.
• You are a self-starter and have strong interpersonal, project management, and analytical skills. You're organized, disciplined and able to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
• Proven ability to create clarity in ambiguous circumstances, including in stakeholder conversations at the onset of a new project, gathering requirements or managing through revision.

The above information has been designed to indicate the general nature and level of work performed in the role. It is not designed to contain or be interpreted as a comprehensive inventory of all duties, responsibilities and qualifications required of employees assigned to this job. The full Job Description can be made available as part of the hiring process.

About Walmart Ecommerce

We are Walmart eCommerce - the team shaping the future of online shopping by defining the global online marketplace that influences millions of shoppers daily. We bring a passion and expertise that is unmatched, and our efforts have an epic impact on the world around us, both inside and outside of work. With colleagues across the nation, we strive to create a sense of belonging and embrace diversity in all forms, with no shortage of guidance and support for you as you grow and develop your career here. Discover the impact you can make at careers.walmart.com.

Minimum Qualifications...

Outlined below are the required minimum qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no minimum qualifications.

Bachelor's degree in Business, Accounting, Finance, Marketing, or related field and 3 years' experience in business development, market development, product development, or relevant area OR 5 years' experience in business development, market development, product development, or related area.

Preferred Qualifications...

Outlined below are the optional preferred qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no preferred qualifications.

Experience in sales., Master's degree in Business, Accounting, Finance, Marketing, Engineering, or related field, Supervisory experience, Working with cross-functional teams

Primary Location...
1400 Se 5th St, Bentonville, AR 72712-6121, United States of America
